definition: life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.chinese: 天命雖難違，奈何總有人要違。

sentences.english: Wang Fuzhi reconstructs the Confucius' theory of nature and destiny on the ground of the view of reason and Qi.
sentences.chinese: 王夫之以理氣觀爲基礎，對孔子的天命論進行改造。

sentences.english: He stressed manpower, advocating destiny was depended on manpower.
sentences.chinese: 他重視人道，主張先講人事，後言天命。

sentences.english: This is the traditional concept of destiny is clearly a huge impact.
sentences.chinese: 這對於傳統的天命觀顯然是巨大的衝擊。

sentences.english: The change in direction was kismet.
sentences.chinese: 事業方向上的轉變說來也是一種天命。

sentences.english: The second point is that the system changes redquin destiny view of Han people and music system in the comments.
sentences.chinese: 二爲漢代人天命觀和禮樂制度的變化在註解中的體現。

sentences.english: The ideas of the calamity is an important part of Dong Zhong-shu's philosophical thoughts on heaven.
sentences.chinese: 天命災異是董仲舒之天的哲學的重要內容。

sentences.english: Finally, we should also consider Han Kin's notion of fate in order to assess him comprehensively.
sentences.chinese: 最後，要全面看待韓信還要對他的天命觀有所認識。

sentences.english: His theory has a positive anti-fatalism significance and some historical limitations as well.
sentences.chinese: 此說具有反天命論的積極意義，但也有其歷史侷限性。

sentences.english: Huang teachers already know the age of Destiny, is the eight-year person.
sentences.chinese: 黃老師已是知天命的年紀，爹孃已是八旬之人。

sentences.english: Who pull out this sword from this stone and anvil is duly born King of all England.
sentences.chinese: 凡能從石臺上拔出此劍者，即爲英格蘭的天命之王。

sentences.english: Although his view of "nature-man integral whole" contained certain fate element, it put more emphasis more the human factor.
sentences.chinese: 其天人觀雖存在天命思想因素，但更多的是強調人事。

sentences.english: This is why you were born. To take that road less traveled and forge a path for others.
sentences.chinese: 這就是你的天命，直達目的少走彎路，引領革命。

sentences.english: A virtuous person chest without care, let destiny without hardship.
sentences.chinese: 有德者胸無牽掛，聽憑天命而沒有憂患。

sentences.english: But vocation acts like a law of God from which there is no escape.
sentences.chinese: 而天命就象上帝地訓誡，傳奇私副，它無可逃避。

sentences.english: Destiny at play, Your Majesty is the true son of Heaven. Nobody can oppose him.
sentences.chinese: 天命有歸，皇上是真龍天子，任何人反對不了。

definition: planning is with man, accomplishing with heaven (idiom); Man proposes but God disposes.

definition: the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
constant (math.)/quota/fixed number (e.g. of places on a bus)/fixed quantity (e.g. load of truck)/destiny
state/country/the Gods of earth and grain
to become Emperor by the grace of Heaven/to "receive the Mandate of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
